Detailed Description

Defines an instruction.

Represented in both undecoded binary form decoded to identify

  • operation to do
  • registers to act on
  • any immediate operand value

Member Function Documentation

void Instruction::Decode (   ) 
 

Decode the binary representation of the instruction.

Member Data Documentation

int Instruction::extra
 

Immediate or target or shamt field or offset. Immediates are sign-extended.

The same thing, but for FP operations.
